member.name: M:Dawnx.NPOI.ExcelSheet.SetColumnWidth(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Tip: This is a new function, not a native method in NPOI. (Let the width be the same as the Excel width.)

member.name: M:Dawnx.NPOI.ExcelSheet.SetColumnWidth(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Tip: This is a new function, not a native method in NPOI. (Let the width be the same as the Excel width.)

member.name: M:Dawnx.NPOI.SheetRange.SmartMerge(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Merge cells that has same value. You can use [[ ]] to identifier cells, the result of merged cell will ignore the value which is in [[ ]].
